channel.title: Hyperion in putty
channel.description:
title says it all, can anyone help me get hyperion to run in putty :D
this is what i use to try to do it
[CODE]java -Xms256m -Xmx378m -cp bin:lib/jython.jar:lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar:lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar:lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar:lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar:lib/junit-4.6.jar org.hyperion.Server[/CODE]
this is what it tells me
[CODE] Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCSpawn init INFO: Loading NPC spawns... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... REMAINDER: Fix the 508+ objects dumped lul. Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:252) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:111) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil.getXStream(XStreamUtil.java:18) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition.init(GameObjectDefinition.java:27) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:117) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:636) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessCon*****er.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:334) ... 8 more
[/CODE]

item.title: Hyperion in putty
item.dc:creator: @sniffle6 sniffle6
item.description:
@sniffle6 wrote:

title says it all, can anyone help me get hyperion to run in putty

this is what i use to try to do it

java -Xms256m -Xmx378m -cp bin:lib/jython.jar:lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar:lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar:lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar:lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar:lib/junit-4.6.jar org.hyperion.Server

this is what it tells me

Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.Server main
INFO: Starting Hyperion...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCSpawn init
INFO: Loading NPC spawns...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43595...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 8080...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start
INFO: Ready
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43594...
REMAINDER: Fix the 508+ objects dumped lul.
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init>
INFO: Loading scripts...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start
INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks...
Jan 11, 2011 3:17:42 AM org.hyperion.Server main
SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion.
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream
      at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:252)
      at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:111)
      at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50)
      at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74)
      at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream
      at org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil.getXStream(XStreamUtil.java:18)
      at org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition.init(GameObjectDefinition.java:27)
      at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:117)
      at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
      at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
      at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
      at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
      at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:636)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream
      at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217)
      at java.security.AccessCon*****er.doPrivileged(Native Method)
      at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205)
      at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321)
      at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294)
      at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266)
      at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:334)
      ... 8 more
